Home.title: UFO
descriptions: 490 million rubles were allocated for new logo
Look what we found in Mogilev region
Aliens will not destroy this planet
Added more angle of attack for aerodynamics

features.name: Economy
features.description: Members can earn money and spend them in the shop. Who will become the most rich and experienced?

features.name: Games
features.description: In casino games you can have fun and bet your economy money. Please do not scream if you lose all your money!

features.name: Utilities
features.description: Bot contains several useful utilities that can help you in server management and communication

features.name: Logs
features.description: Bot can log messages deletions and edits and all server moderation actions

features.name: Moderation
features.description: Punish malicious violators of your server rules with warns, mutes, kicks and bans

features.name: Automoderation
features.description: And for some violations, the bot can punish members automatically!

features.name: Greetings
features.description: UFO will gladly greet new server members in channel and in DMs and give them roles

features.name: Settings
features.description: The bot has a convenient and intuitive control panel where you can customize the most of the features

Donate.title: Donate
Donate.name: Donate
Donate.description:
Support us to get UFO Boosts! You can activate them on servers with command boost
Activating the boost on the server opens bonus features on it:

features.name: Experience for messages
features.description: Set amount of experience that will be given to members for messages with certain chance

features.name: Punishments DM messages
features.description: Set message with template variables and embeds that will be sent to kicked/banned members id DM

features.name: Money bonuses
features.description: Set daily and weekly bonuses on the server

features.name: Icons for items and jobs
features.description: Set icons for items and custom jobs that will be displayed in information about them and when buying/working. Displayed as embed thumbnail

features.name: Increased limits
features.description: Limit of items in the shop - 30 (instead of 15), custom jobs - 15 (instead of 5), giveaways - 15 (instead of 5), coupons - 15 (instead of 5)

standard.name: Standard
perks: Role [R] on support server with permission to change nickname

premium.name: Premium
perks: Role [R] on support server with permission to view audit log

Me.noGuilds: No servers to add or configure the bot

subtitles.boostDescription: If you want to set custom messages that will be send to kicked and banned via command members in DM
subtitles.testsDescription: Sends to you selected message in DM for you to check that messages, embeds and all templates are filled correctly. UFO bot will be used as a moderator variable. Ban duration will be 1 hour. Save all changes before testing.

invites.name: Invites
invites.description: This filter is triggered by any valid invite link to Discord server. You can enter server IDs and invite codes that will be ignored.

flood.name: Flood
flood.description: This filter is triggered by flood of two types: first, consisting of a large number of messages, and second, consisting of messages containing a large number of characters. If specified number of messages or sum of characters in messages will be exceeded by user in less than one minute, filter will be triggered. We recommend using default values (20 messages and 3000 characters) and changing them if necessary

errors.reasonLength: Reason cannot be longer than 512 characters
errors.invalidDuration: Duration must be a positive integer
errors.invalidWarns: Warns amount must be an integer
errors.duplicateWarns: Punishment for this count of warns is already set

subtitles.testsDescription: Simulates event of your joining or leaving the server for you to check that messages, embeds and all templates are filled correctly. Save all changes before testing.

paragraphs.name: Introduction
items: These Terms of Service (hereinafter referred to as the – «Terms») govern the use of the Discord bot UFO (hereinafter referred to as the – «Bot») and the website https://ufobot.ru (hereinafter referred to as the – «Bot»). By using the Bot and/or the Site, you agree to these Terms.
The administration reserves the right to change these Terms at any time without prior notice. The updated Terms come into force from the moment they are published on the Site.

paragraphs.name: Description of services
items: The bot provides users with the opportunity to receive a variety of information and services within the Discord server. The functionality of the Bot may include, but is not limited to: informational notifications, entertainment functions, assistance in server management.
The Site provides information about the Bot, instructions for its use and helps to interact with users.

paragraphs.name: Registration and account
items: To use the Bot, you may need to log in with your Discord account. Using the Bot functionality implies that you agree to Discord's privacy policy.
You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.

paragraphs.name: Disclaimer
items: The administration of the Bot and the Site is not responsible for any direct or indirect damage caused to users as a result of the use or inability to use the services of the Bot and/or the Site.
The Administration does not guarantee uninterrupted and error-free operation of the Bot and the Site. All services are provided on an "as is" basis.

paragraphs.name: User content
items: Users are responsible for any content they post, upload or otherwise make available through the Bot and/or the Site.
The administration reserves the right to remove any content that, in its opinion, violates these Terms or is illegal, offensive, threatening or inappropriate.

paragraphs.name: Privacy Policy
items: All personal information provided by users is processed in accordance with the Privacy Policy, posted on the Site.
By using the Bot and/or the Site, you agree to the terms of our Privacy Policy.

paragraphs.name: Intellectual property
items: All materials and content available on the Site and through the Bot, including text, graphics, logos and software, are the property of the administration or its licensors and are protected by copyright and intellectual property laws.
Users do not have the right to copy, distribute or create derivative works based on the content without the written permission of the administration.

paragraphs.name: Changes and termination of service
items: The administration reserves the right to change, suspend or terminate the provision of services to the Bot and/or the Site at any time without prior notice.
The User may stop using the Bot and/or the Site at any time.

paragraphs.name: Governing Law
items: These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Russian Federation.

paragraphs.name: Contact information
items: For any questions related to these Terms, you can contact us on our support server on Discord.

paragraphs.name: Introduction
items: This Privacy Policy (hereinafter referred to as the “Policy”) determines the procedure for processing and protecting personal data of users of the Discord bot UFO (hereinafter referred to as the “Bot”) and the website https://ufobot.ru (hereinafter referred to as the “Site”).
By using the Bot and/or the Site, you consent to the processing of your personal data in accordance with this Policy.
The administration reserves the right to change this Policy at any time without prior notice. The updated Policy comes into force from the moment it is published on the Site.

paragraphs.name: Collection of personal data
items: We collect the following categories of personal data: Discord account information (user ID); contact information provided by you; information about the Discord server (IDs of server, roles, channels, server members).
We do not collect special categories of personal data (for example, message content).

paragraphs.name: Use of personal data
items: Personal data is used to provide the functionality of the Bot and the Website.
We do not share your personal data with third parties, except as required by law or when necessary to provide services (for example, to process payments).

paragraphs.name: Protection of personal data
items: We take all necessary organizational and technical measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized or accidental access, destruction, modification, blocking, copying and distribution.
Access to personal data is provided only to authorized employees who are required to maintain the confidentiality of this information.

paragraphs.name: Storage of personal data
items: Personal data is stored for the time necessary to achieve the purposes for which it was collected or for the period established by the law.
Once the purposes of processing have been achieved or at your request, personal data will be deleted.

paragraphs.name: User rights
items: You have the right to: erase your personal data; restrict the processing of your personal data.
To exercise your rights, you can contact us on the support server.

paragraphs.name: Cookies
items: We use Cookies to improve the functionality of the Site.
You can customize the use of Cookies in your browser settings. However, disabling Cookies may affect the functionality of some features of the Site.

paragraphs.name: Third party resources
items: The Site and Bot may contain links to third-party resources, for the content and privacy policies of which we are not responsible.
